entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
